stories.title: Why was everyone talking about the Grafana Loki logo?
Graduate from DataDog with Grafana Cloud.
Grafana Labs annouces: Project Thor, like Prometheus but for cats.
Google annouces discontinution of Google Cloud.
InfluxData annouces Series Z, $100 quadrillion funding round.
IBM aquires AWS, Google and Microsoft, still forth place in cloud.
Grafana Labs pre-annouces plugins for all future AWS services.
Thanos: Long term storage for half your Prometheus metrics.
Grafana Labs CEO: "Who need VC when you have GitHub stars?"
